claim: Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial against Fluarix (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine).

extracted_evidence.quote: In this randomized trial (Clinical trials gov: NCT03722589), sera pre- and post vaccination with quadrivalent inactivated egg based (IIV4), cell culture based (ccIIV4), and recombinant (RIV4) influenza
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly states that the randomized trial evaluated quadrivalent recombinant influenza vaccine (RIV4, which is Flublok) alongside quadrivalent inactivated egg-based (IIV4) and cell culture-based (ccIIV4) vaccines, confirming that Flublok (quadrivalent) was evaluated in the pivotal trial.

extracted_evidence.quote: Enrolled and Randomized n=723 vaccine Allocation Flu zone IIV4 n=122 18-44 years: n=57 45-64 years: n=65 Completed day 0 (n=110) 1 month (n=110) and 6 months (n=101) visit Fluarix IIV4 n=120 18-44 years: n=55 45-64 years: n=65 Completed day 0 (n=120) 1 month (n=118) and 6 months (n=107) visit re-enrolled in Year 2 and new enrollees randomized n=684 (139*) ccIIV4 in Year 1 n=214 RIV4 in Year 1 n=152
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote provides the actual allocation of participants to the Fluarix IIV4 (quadrivalent standard-dose vaccine) and RIV4 (Flublok quadrivalent), showing that both vaccines were directly compared in the pivotal trial.

extracted_evidence.quote: Abbreviations: IIV4: Inactivated influenza vaccine (Fluzone or Fluarix® Quadrivalent; ccIIV4: Cell culture based IIV ... RIV4: recombinant hemagglutinin influenza vaccine (Flublok® Quadrivalent.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote clarifies that Fluarix® Quadrivalent is the standard-dose comparator and Flublok® Quadrivalent is the recombinant vaccine (RIV4), confirming the identity of the vaccines compared in the trial.
